mapper.insert: insert into spt_advice (ID, ADVICE_NO, MEMBER_NO, ADVICE_TIME, ADVICE_CONTENT, HANDLER, HANDLE_TIME, HANDLE_RESULT, DETAIL, REMARK) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{adviceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adviceTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{adviceContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{handler,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{handleTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{handleResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update spt_advice set ADVICE_NO = #{adviceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADVICE_TIME = #{adviceTime,jdbcType=DATE}, ADVICE_CONTENT = #{adviceContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HANDLER = #{handler,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HANDLE_TIME = #{handleTime,jdbcType=DATE}, HANDLE_RESULT = #{handleResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DETAIL = #{detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select ID, ADVICE_NO, MEMBER_NO, ADVICE_TIME, ADVICE_CONTENT, HANDLER, HANDLE_TIME, HANDLE_RESULT, DETAIL, REMARK from spt_advice where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select ID, ADVICE_NO, MEMBER_NO, ADVICE_TIME, ADVICE_CONTENT, HANDLER, HANDLE_TIME, HANDLE_RESULT, DETAIL, REMARK from spt_advice

select * from spt_advice where ADVICE_NO like #{adviceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and MEMBER_NO like #{memberNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ADVICE_CONTENT like #{adviceContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and HANDLER like #{handler,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and HANDLE_RESULT like #{handleResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DETAIL like #{detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and REMARK like #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
